select pi.id, pi.title, pi.content, pi.images, pi.user_id, pi.create_date, pi.pageviews, pi.tag_ids, pi.delete_flag, si.name as studentName, si.images as studentImages from post_info pi left join student_info si on (si.id = pi.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.studentName},'%')
AND pi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.title},'%')
order by pi.create_date desc
